title: Integrate locks into task manager
description: Modify scripts/task-manager.py to wrap save_task() with exclusive locks and load_task() with shared locks. Add retry logic with exponential backoff for lock contention. Add with_lock parameter (default True) for backward compatibility.
completion_notes: Integrated file locking into task-manager.py with shared locks for load_task() and exclusive locks for save_task(). Added retry logic with exponential backoff and with_lock parameter for backward compatibility
